thread.title: OFFICIAL: Medeama sign partnership agreement with Saudi side Al-Wahda
thread.title_full: OFFICIAL: Medeama sign partnership agreement with Saudi side Al-Wahda

title: OFFICIAL: Medeama sign partnership agreement with Saudi side Al-Wahda
text:
Sports News | 12 October 2015 09:10 CET OFFICIAL: Medeama sign partnership agreement with Saudi side Al-Wahda Al-Wahda sign partnership agreement with Ghanaâ€™s Medeama 
Medeama have completed the signing of a partnership agreement with Saudi Arabia side Al-Wahda on Sunday. 
The ambitious Ghanaian side signed the long-term deal with the gulf side which will see both clubs exchange programmes in areas of expertise. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
